Program codeforces_67b

  implicit none

  integer :: n, k, a, j, jj, m, temp_m 

  integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: bb, aa 

  ! Read input:

  read(*, *) n, k 

  allocate( bb(0:n-1) )

  allocate( aa(0:n-1) )

  ! Initialize aa to zeros:

  do a =0, n-1 

    aa(a) =0 

  end do 

  read(*, *) ( bb(a), a=0, n-1 )

  m =0 ! holds the length of 'aa' so far 

  

  do a =n-1, 0, -1 

    j =0 

    do while ( bb(a) >0 ) 

      if (aa(j) >= a +k ) then 

        bb(a) = bb(a) -1 

      end if 

      j = j +1 

    end do 

    temp_m =m 

    m = m +1 

    do jj=temp_m, j +1, -1 

      aa(jj) =aa(jj -1) 

    end do 

    aa(j) =a 

  end do 

  ! Output:

  write(*, '(1000i0,1x)') ( aa(i)+1, i=0, n-1 )

  ! Wait, but the above adds an extra space at the end.

  do a=0, n-2 

    write(*, '(i0,1x)', advance='no') aa(a)+1 

  end do 

  write(*, '(i0)') aa(n-1)+1 

  

end program
